summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1498, for the improvement of East Galer Street, in the City of Seattle from 17th Avenue North to 24th Avenue North, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon under Ordinance No. 16007 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
